verses.verse: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is my shepherd <S%H7462><s%>; I shall not want <S%H2637><s%>.
He makes me to lie down <S%H7257><s%> in green <S%H1877><s%> pastures <S%H4999><s%>: he leads <S%H5095><s%> me beside the still <S%H4496><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.
He restores <S%H7725><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>: he leads <S%H5148><s%> me in the paths <S%H4570><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> for his name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake.

Yes <S%H3212><s%>, though I walk through the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>, I will fear <S%H3372><s%> no evil <S%H7451><s%>: for you are with me <S%H7626><s%>; your rod and your staff <S%H4938><s%> they comfort me <S%H5162><s%>.

You prepare <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in the presence of my enemies <S%H6887><s%>: you anoint <S%H1878><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>; my cup <S%H3563><s%> runs over <S%H7310><s%>.

Surely goodness <S%H2896><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall follow <S%H7291><s%> me all the days <S%H3117><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%>: and I will live <S%H3427><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for ever <S%H753><s%>.
